item.title: Typographic Design for a Miura Fold Map of San Francisco
item.author: hello@aentan.com (AenTan)
item.description: Content Highlights 38 spots around the city, including the best tea shop in Chinatown, a mini-park 11 stories in the air, a private library, and a bunch of amazing restaurants. Construction The map is printed on waterproof tear-resistant Tyvek. It’s then folded up using an origami technique that allows it to smoothly open and close in one motion, and makes it impossible to misfold. Manufacturing Info The map is printed by Yushin-Plus, an art printing company in Tokyo, and folded by the Miura-Ori Lab, also in Tokyo.
